title: Calories in 90/10 Ground Beef
meta_description: Discover calories in 9010 ground beef per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: 90% lean, 10% fat ground beef, cooked (pan-broiled patty), drained of excess fat; no added seasonings or binders.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact lean/fat ratio, cooking method, portion size, and brand; raw values differ from cooked. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cooked 90/10 ground beef provides ~217 kcal and ~26g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 90/10 ground beef per 100g?
faqs.a: About 217 kcal for cooked 90/10 ground beef per 100g.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 9010 ground beef?
Does cooking change calories in 90/10 ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, cooked (per 100g) has more calories than raw due to water loss; raw is ~176 kcal.

faqs.q: How much fat in 9010 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 11.7g total fat per 100g cooked, with 4.7g saturated.
Yes, 0g carbs and 0g fiber per 100g cooked.
